attributes.action: Legislate to allow the people enact referendum to disband parliament.
attributes.additional_details: With the current war in Syria and videos strongly countering any government arguments, combined with the treasonous behavior exhibited daily in the houses of lords and commons. The obvious conflicts of financial interest of those holding EU pensions holding positions of power. It is time the people had the right to remove a Government not acting in the best interests of the British people before they can do 5 years worth of damage.
attributes.background: Legislate to allow the people their sovereign right to disband the government. 1, For Treasonous behavior. 2, For enacting war against the will of the people. 3 For tyrannous behavior.  On receipt of a petition containing 1million signatures, Parliament must hold a referendum to disband Government.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
